sourcesContent:
import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import { Envelope, EnvelopeFill, Facebook, GeoAlt, GeoAltFill, Google, Instagram, Linkedin, Telegram, TelephoneFill, Twitter, Youtube, } from "react-bootstrap-icons"; import { useNavigate, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; function Footer() { const router = useNavigate(); const { pathname } = useLocation(); console.log(pathname); useEffect(() => { if (pathname == "/contacts" || pathname == "/") { document.getElementById("footsec").style.display = "none"; } else { document.getElementById("footsec").style.display = "block"; } }, [pathname]); return (

FIND US

No-111 3rd main road, alvarthirunagar , chennai -107.

CALL

0-44 340904040

EMAIL

teampatchworkps@gmail.com
{ router("/"); }} />

{" "} HI, TEAM PATCHWORK HERE. WE ARE FREELANCE PHOTOGRAPHER IN NY AND THE SHUTTERBUG CAPTURING LIFE'S MAGICAL MOMENTS ONE

USEFULL LINK

{router('/')}}>HOME
{router('/about')}}>ABOUT US
{router('/works')}}>WORKS
{router('/service')}}>SERVICES
{router('/contacts')}}>CONTACT US

SUBSCRIBE

); } export default Footer;
